description: Demolition of disused building and erection of single-occupant dwelling
decision_conditions: Please provide information regarding the amount by which you seek to reduce the tree by, either in metres or by percentage.

The applicant has failed to submit a flood Risk assessment (FRA) and as such has not advanced compelling justification that the change of use from a workshop to a more vulnerable residential use would not expose the resulting dwellinghouse to unacceptable flood risk, contrary to policies CS1 and DM1 of the LDF Core Strategy for Kingston Upon Thames and the provisions of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019.
That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise due to COVID19 lockdown. Photos provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable works to maintain the trees at a size appropriate to their location. No loss to public amenity.Recommendation:No objections.
